attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. This vehicle is clean and mechanically sound with full service history. If you want a safe, realiable and low risk SUV with 4x4 capabilities then she is the one for you. This car has the following features that include; Air Control,Alloy wheels,Radio and more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged!
